tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE speech_violations (
    violation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_date DATE,
    country VARCHAR(255),
    violation_type VARCHAR(255),
    severity INT,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE freedom_of_speech_violations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_date DATE,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    violation_type VARCHAR(50),
    penalty_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE speech_violation_locations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50),
    city VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE freedom_of_speech_violations (
   violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   country VARCHAR(255),
   violation_type VARCHAR(255),
   violation_date DATE,
   penalty VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE speech_violation_reports (
   report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   violation_id INT,
   reporter_name VARCHAR(255),
   report_date DATE,
   comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE speech_violation_locations (
   location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   violation_id INT,
   city VARCHAR(100),
   state VARCHAR(100),
   country VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE violations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  location VARCHAR,
  description VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE violators (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  nationality VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE trends (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR,
  trend_description VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id UUID,
  violation_id UUID,
  trend_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE locations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR,
  region VARCHAR,
  country VARCHAR
)
